stories.title: Imagine a free desktop GUI client of a Sudoku generator API for commercial use
Digital esthetics, environmental change and the subcultures of computer art

stories.text:
This is a simple single page weather app I made that grabs data from NOAA for where I live.

If you view the html source you can see it's pretty easy to configure it for wherever you live in the U.S. You just have to edit the links.

Personally, I like using this more than any of the weather apps out there because it's fast and has the data I want and need, and no ads.

It uses the latest version of Bootstrap and jQuery.

https://ezofficetech.com/branson/
stories.title: Show HN: Simple Weather App

stories.text:
While there are a lot of resources about how important the microbiome is to our physical and mental health, there seems to be little solid advice for how to optimize one's microbiome.

My impression so far appears to be to: * avoid anti-biotics * avoid probiotics (unless prescribed by our doctor after a recent course of anti-biotics) * go for fermented foods like Sauerkraut, Kimchi, Kefir, ... * increase your intake of fibre rich foods, * ?

What else?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you optimize your microbiome?
Growth of The Information is good news for media business
